channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Shooting kills 3 officers and wounds 2 more in rural Pennsylvania. Police say the shooter is dead
item.description: Authorities have been investigating a shooting that killed three officers and wounded two more in rural southern Pennsylvania.

item.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk killing feared being shot by police before surrendering, sheriff says
Hurricane Helene displaced thousands of students. Some struggled to get back on track with school
